snippet: In a campaign season of strident partisanship, two New Yorkers have put their money behind a project using a replica of the Oval Office desk designed to coax people into talking about their dreams for America.
abstract: In a campaign season of strident partisanship, two New Yorkers have put their money behind a project using a replica of the Oval Office desk designed to coax people into talking about their dreams for America.

headline.main: For Five Minutes, You Can Be President
headline.print_headline: For Five Minutes, You Can Be President
